availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, painter. Native of Canada. Married to Lydia White Oakes in Boston, Suffolk County, Massachusetts, on May 2, 1838. Father of Louisa Lydia Oakes, Eliza Oakes, George Oakes, and Isabelle Oakes. Painter in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1850. Painter in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 278A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 4, p. 654.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 12, p. 614B-615A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994041, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 302.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #1272.
Massachusetts Birth, Marriage, and Death Records (1620-1988), Massachusetts Vital and Town Records, accessed via ancestry.com, p. 134.
